column1: Smoque BBQ////But alas. I have found my oasis of southern BBQ in Old Irving
column2: right in the middle of the North side. Bonus points for the blue line. Bonus points for the 24 hour Pulaski bus. More bonus points for a short bus ride to a short bus ride to the HIP (just in case you wanted to shop til you drop as the food coma kicks in).
